cohort.translation[0].definitions[0].def: someone’s cohorts are their friends who support them and stay loyal to them – used to show disapproval
cohort.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Mark and his cohorts eventually emerged from the studio.
cohort.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a group of people of the same age, social class etc, especially when they are being studied
cohort.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: a cohort of 386 patients aged 65 plus
